name: Glorious Glacier Grotto
description:
A procedurally-generated labyrinth-exploring penguin-themed game.

To win the game you must collect all the eggs, while evading the yetis. Each egg gives you one more partner, increasing your score multiplier. The more partners you have, the faster you are.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys.

Additional Controls:

M - mute music
N - mute sound
P - pause

Source code on GitHub
